name: Savit
description: Savit is a platform that connects individuals who intend to adopt a pet, and animal associations, which can register and manage the pets that currently need a home. This application is simply a prototype, an idea which was born from the desire to provide the different animal protection organisations with their own space with a pleasant design, where they could easily see the different pets that were under their care, in a complementary way to the different social networks, so necessary nowadays to obtain visibility.
status: Work in progress, it hasn't been worked since the finish of the bootcamp. I will take it in the future.

name: Free the alpaca
description: This is the very first project of mine. A game made on HTML canvas.
status: It is finished, I want to make some changes to make it usable on mobile, but i have other things to do right now so it has to wait.
